page.title: 05Health Care in Culcheth
page.content: There is good health care in Culcheth. We have three doctors at the Surgery at the bottom of Jackson Avenue. There are two Dentists, Mr.Johnson and Mr.Cockbain, in the Dental Surgery in Hob Hey Lane. There is also a Dentist at Swallow Court and an Optician's on Common Lane. There are two Chemists in the village, and a Clinic where you can go for Chiropody and a few other things. The Clinic is on Jackson Avenue next to the Cub Hut.{ { }If you have an accident and need to go to the Hospital you will be taken to Warrington General Hospital. There is a good Ambulance Service in the Warrington area, run from a central depot in Farrell Street. { { {Christopher Poole
